name: crypto-commits-runner
description: Simple NodeJS application which gets a list of crypto assets (coins and token) then checks each one for it's associated Github repositories. Intended to be run on a schedule.
author: Harvey Gomez

dependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-prettier: The plugin allows Prettier violations to be reported as ESLint errors
dependenciesComments.eslint-config-airbnb-base: AirBnBs sharable ESLint configuration and coding style guide.
dependenciesComments.eslint-config-prettier: Turns off all ESLint rules that are unnecessary or might conflict with Prettier.
dependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-import: Intends to support linting of ES2015+ (ES6+) import/export syntax. Required by AirBnB Base
